2004-01-15.snippet: For James L. Dimon, the onetime protégé of Sanford I. Weill, the Citigroup chairman, the merger of the Bank One Corporation with J. P. Morgan Chase & Company represents the sweetest form of redemption, if not revenge....
2004-01-15.lead_paragraph: For James L. Dimon, the onetime protégé of Sanford I. Weill, the Citigroup chairman, the merger of the Bank One Corporation with J. P. Morgan Chase & Company represents the sweetest form of redemption, if not revenge.

headline.main: An Outcast From Citigroup Will Inherit the Leadership of a Merged Global Rival
